meanings.definition: relating to the study of the processes affecting organic remains
meanings.sent1: The scientist conducted a taphonomic analysis of the bones to understand their decay.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use taphonomic methods to investigate how plants and animals decompose.
meanings.sent3: The taphonomic investigation revealed interesting details about the decomposition process.
meanings.sent4: Her taphonomic approach to the study of fossils shed light on ancient ecosystems.
meanings.sent5: The taphonomic evidence painted a clear picture of the environmental changes over time.

meanings.definition: the study of how organisms decay and become fossilized
meanings.sent1: Learning about taphonomic processes helps us understand how fossils form.
meanings.sent2: The museum curator specialized in taphonomic research on ancient bones.
meanings.sent3: The taphonomic class was both fascinating and informative.
meanings.sent4: His passion for taphonomic studies led him to discover rare fossil specimens.
meanings.sent5: The taphonomic expert could identify the age of fossils with great accuracy.
